item.description: score:55 Chances: The joint sports venture streaming service with ESPN, Fox, and Warner Bros. Discovery could be a major opportunity for Disney to capitalize on the growing streaming market. The hiring of Pete Distad, a former Apple and Hulu executive, as the CEO of the sports streaming platform shows Disney’s commitment to bringing in top talent for its new ventures.
